fileheader.filedesc: Functions to send and receive data over an HTTP connection using POL's internal webserver. Scripts in /scripts/www are considered at the top level directory. I.e. http://192.168.0.5:8088/online.ecl

function.name: WriteHtml
function.explain: Writes a line of HTML to the "virtual webpage" that will be sent to the connecting browser and appends a new-line.

function.name: WriteHtmlRaw
function.explain: Writes a line of HTML to the "virtual webpage" that will be sent to the connecting browser, does NOT append a new-line.

function.name: QueryParam
function.explain: Query's the accessed URL for any embedded parameters. (see your favorite HTML docs for parameter embedding! :) )
function.return: String value of the embedded param, or 0 if not found.

function.name: QueryIP
function.explain: returns the IP address of the connecting browser
